metadata.title: CVE-2017-7506 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
spice versions though 0.13 are vulnerable to out-of-bounds memory accesswhen processing specially crafted messages from authenticated attacker tothe spice server resulting into crash and/or server memory leak.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7506` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libspice-server1 - 0.12.6-4ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spice package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.12.6-4ubuntu0.3').
